command: docker run --rm --volumes-from api01 ubuntu bash -lc 'd=/var/lib/app/data; [ -d "$d" ] && find "$d" -xdev -type f -print0 | xargs -0 -r shred -n 2 -z -u; sync'
explanation: Uses --volumes-from to access the api01 container's data volume and securely overwrites and deletes all files under the app data directory, then flushes writes.
rationale_steps: Limit scope to the intended directory to prevent collateral damage
Shred with multiple passes and zeroing, then unlink
